commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We're back from our shopping trip!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Welcome back.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: That was quick. I thought you'd be out longer.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Dia's shopping list was really easy to follow. Everything went smoothly since she categorized everything nicely.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: You always have everything covered, Dia.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: *Chuckle* Thank you very much. So, did you manage to get everything?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yup! Including the meatballs.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Wow! Thanks!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: All right! Let's get to chopping up everything they bought, Rina!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Everything's chopped up nicely. Great knife skills, you two.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh. All vegetables touched by me receive the blessings of the fallen angel, and are reborn more beautiful and enticing than ever!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Really? You sure have some skills there, Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I am not some average human being, after...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Wait, I'm not Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: *Chuckle* You're so funny, Yoshiko.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I'm not trying to be funny! And it's Yohane!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Hey guys? Back to the hotpot. Doesn't it look like there are a lot of mushrooms in here? We've got three different ones: button mushrooms, shimeji, and maitake.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Mushrooms are full of flavor, so they're essential to hotpots. They're also low in calories, and high in vitamins and minerals, so they're good for you too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Really? Mushrooms are like superfoods, then!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I knew they were essential to hotpots, but I didn't know they were so good for your health as well.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I see, so that's why Eli has such a good figure! It's the mushrooms!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: So that's the secret to your soft, healthy curves!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Whaa?! Why are you guys talking about me all of a sudden? Gosh, I'm so embarrassed.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: It's your fault for having a figure that's just asking for compliments, Eli.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Come on, Kotori! Stop teasing me!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Are those cheeks of yours blushing? Look at how adorable you are!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: There is no need to be humble since you have such wonderful proportions, Eli. I will use what I've learned to apply to my own beauty regimen.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: How do I become more like you, Eli? Do I need to know more about mushrooms?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Ugh, for crying out loud! Focus on the cooking!
